name: Executioner
description:
You are an executioner. What is morally right and what is morally wrong? That is up to you to decide; the fate of other people's lives are in your hands.

Originally created in August 2015 for Ludum Dare 33. Developed in 48 hours by Justin Nauta, based on the Theme "You are the Monster". Re-Uploaded to this website, but left unchanged for posterity purposes.
